verses.verse: It happened after <S%H310>this,<s%> that <S%H53>Absalom<s%> <S%H6213>prepared<s%> him a <S%H4818>chariot<s%> and <S%H5483>horses,<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> to <S%H7323>run<s%> before <S%H6440>him.<s%>

<S%H53>Absalom<s%> rose up <S%H7925>early,<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H3027>beside<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate.<s%> It was <S%H376>so,<s%> that when any man had a <S%H7379>suit<s%> which should <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> for <S%H4941>judgment,<s%> then <S%H53>Absalom<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> to <S%H559>him,<s%> and said, <S%H335>"What<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> are you <S%H559>from?<s%>" He said, "Your <S%H5650>servant<s%> is of <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>"

<S%H53>Absalom<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7200>him,<s%> "Behold, your <S%H1697>matters<s%> are <S%H2896>good<s%> and <S%H5228>right;<s%> but there is no man deputized by the <S%H4428>king<s%> to hear <S%H8085>you.<s%>"

<S%H53>Absalom<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H7760>moreover,<s%> "Oh that I were made <S%H8199>judge<s%> in the <S%H776>land,<s%> that every <S%H376>man<s%> who has any <S%H7379>suit<s%> or <S%H4941>cause<s%> might <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H6663>me,<s%> and I would do him justice!"

It was <S%H376>so,<s%> that when any man came <S%H7126>near<s%> to do him <S%H7812>obeisance,<s%> he put <S%H7971>forth<s%> his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H2388>took<s%> hold of <S%H5401>him,<s%> and kissed him.

<S%H53>Absalom<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> this sort of <S%H1697>thing<s%> to all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> who <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> for <S%H4941>judgment.<s%> So <S%H53>Absalom<s%> <S%H1589>stole<s%> the <S%H3820>hearts<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

It happened at the <S%H7093>end<s%> of <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> that <S%H53>Absalom<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> "Please let me <S%H3212>go<s%> and <S%H7999>pay<s%> my <S%H5088>vow,<s%> which I have <S%H5087>vowed<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> in <S%H2275>Hebron.<s%>

For your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H5087>vowed<s%> a <S%H5088>vow<s%> while I <S%H3427>stayed<s%> at <S%H1650>Geshur<s%> in <S%H758>Syria,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3068><s%> 'If Yahweh shall indeed bring me <S%H7725>again<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> then I will <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>'"
The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3212>him,<s%> "Go in <S%H7965>peace.<s%>" So he <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H2275>Hebron.<s%>

But <S%H53>Absalom<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H7270>spies<s%> throughout all the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "As soon as you <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet,<s%> then you shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H53><s%> 'Absalom is <S%H4427>king<s%> in <S%H2275>Hebron!<s%>'"

Two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> with <S%H53>Absalom<s%> out of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> who were <S%H7121>invited,<s%> and <S%H1980>went<s%> in their <S%H8537>simplicity;<s%> and they <S%H3045>didn't<s%> know <S%H1697>anything.<s%>

<S%H53>Absalom<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> for <S%H302>Ahithophel<s%> the <S%H1526>Gilonite,<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>'s <S%H3289>counselor,<s%> from his <S%H5892>city,<s%> even from <S%H1542>Giloh,<s%> while he was <S%H2076>offering<s%> the <S%H2077>sacrifices.<s%> The <S%H7195>conspiracy<s%> was <S%H533>strong;<s%> for the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7227>increased<s%> <S%H1980>continually<s%> with <S%H53>Absalom.<s%>
A <S%H5046>messenger<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "The <S%H3820>hearts<s%> of the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> are <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H53>Absalom.<s%>"

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to all his <S%H5650>servants<s%> who were with him at <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H6965>"Arise,<s%> and let us <S%H1272>flee;<s%> for else none of us shall <S%H6413>escape<s%> <S%H6440>from<s%> <S%H53>Absalom.<s%> Make <S%H4116>speed<s%> to <S%H3212>depart,<s%> lest he <S%H5381>overtake<s%> us <S%H4116>quickly,<s%> and <S%H5080>bring<s%> down <S%H7451>evil<s%> on <S%H5221>us,<s%> and strike the <S%H5892>city<s%> with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>"

The <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H5650>"Behold,<s%> your servants are ready to do whatever my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H977>chooses.<s%>"

The <S%H4428>king<s%> went <S%H3318>forth,<s%> and all his <S%H1004>household<s%> <S%H7272>after<s%> <S%H4428>him.<s%> The king <S%H5800>left<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H802>women,<s%> who were <S%H6370>concubines,<s%> to <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H1004>house.<s%>
The <S%H4428>king<s%> went <S%H3318>forth,<s%> and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7272>after<s%> <S%H5975>him;<s%> and they stayed in <S%H1004>Beth<s%> <S%H4801>Merhak.<s%>

All his <S%H5650>servants<s%> passed <S%H5674>on<s%> <S%H3027>beside<s%> <S%H3774>him;<s%> and all the Cherethites, and all the <S%H6432>Pelethites,<s%> and all the <S%H1663>Gittites,<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> who <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H7272>after<s%> him from <S%H1661>Gath,<s%> passed <S%H5674>on<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king.<s%>

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H863>Ittai<s%> the <S%H1663>Gittite,<s%> "Why do you also <S%H3212>go<s%> with <S%H7725>us?<s%> Return, and <S%H3427>stay<s%> with the <S%H4428>king;<s%> for you are a <S%H5237>foreigner,<s%> and also an <S%H1540>exile.<s%> Return to your own <S%H4725>place.<s%>

Whereas you <S%H935>came<s%> but <S%H8543>yesterday,<s%> should I this <S%H3117>day<s%> make you <S%H3212>go<s%> up and <S%H5128>down<s%> with <S%H1980>us,<s%> since I go where I <S%H7725>may?<s%> Return, and take <S%H7725>back<s%> your <S%H251>brothers.<s%> <S%H2617>Mercy<s%> and truth be with <S%H571>you.<s%>"

<S%H863>Ittai<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> and <S%H6030>said,<s%> "As <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H2416>lives,<s%> and as my <S%H3068>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H2416>lives,<s%> surely in what <S%H4725>place<s%> my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> shall <S%H4194>is,<s%> whether for death or for <S%H2416>life,<s%> even there also will your servant <S%H5650>be.<s%>"

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H863>Ittai,<s%> <S%H3212>"Go<s%> and pass <S%H5674>over.<s%>" <S%H863>Ittai<s%> the <S%H1663>Gittite<s%> passed <S%H5674>over,<s%> and all his <S%H582>men,<s%> and all the little ones who were with <S%H2945>him.<s%>

All the <S%H776>country<s%> <S%H1058>wept<s%> with a <S%H1419>loud<s%> <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> passed <S%H5674>over:<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> also himself passed <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H5158>brook<s%> <S%H6939>Kidron,<s%> and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> passed <S%H5674>over,<s%> <S%H6440>toward<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

<S%H6659>Behold,<s%> Zadok also <S%H3881>came,<s%> and all the Levites with <S%H5375>him,<s%> bearing the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H430>God;<s%> and they set <S%H3332>down<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God;<s%> and <S%H54>Abiathar<s%> went <S%H5927>up,<s%> until all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H8552>finished<s%> <S%H5674>passing<s%> out of the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6659>Zadok,<s%> "Carry <S%H7725>back<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> into the <S%H5892>city.<s%> If I <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> he will bring me <S%H7725>again,<s%> and <S%H7200>show<s%> me both <S%H5116>it,<s%> and his habitation;
but if he <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H2654>thus,<s%> 'I have no delight in <S%H6213>you;<s%>' behold, here am I. Let him do to me as <S%H5869>seems<s%> good to <S%H2896>him.<s%>"

The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> also to <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> <S%H7200>"Aren't<s%> you a seer? <S%H7725>Return<s%> into the <S%H5892>city<s%> in <S%H7965>peace,<s%> and your <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> with <S%H290>you,<s%> Ahimaaz your <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H54>Abiathar.<s%>
<S%H7200>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H4102>stay<s%> at the <S%H6160>fords<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> until <S%H1697>word<s%> comes from you to inform <S%H935>me.<s%>"
<S%H6659>Zadok<s%> therefore and <S%H54>Abiathar<s%> <S%H7725>carried<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> and they stayed <S%H3427>there.<s%>

<S%H1732>David<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> by the <S%H5927>ascent<s%> of the Mount of <S%H2132>Olives,<s%> and <S%H1058>wept<s%> as he went <S%H5927>up;<s%> and he had his <S%H7218>head<s%> <S%H2645>covered,<s%> and <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H3182>barefoot:<s%> and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> who were with him <S%H2645>covered<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H7218>head,<s%> and they went <S%H5927>up,<s%> <S%H1058>weeping<s%> as they went <S%H5927>up.<s%>

Someone <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H302>"Ahithophel<s%> is among the <S%H7194>conspirators<s%> with <S%H53>Absalom.<s%>" <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3068>"Yahweh,<s%> please turn the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of <S%H302>Ahithophel<s%> into <S%H5528>foolishness.<s%>"

It happened that when <S%H1732>David<s%> had <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H7218>top,<s%> where <S%H430>God<s%> was <S%H7812>worshiped,<s%> <S%H2365>behold,<s%> Hushai the <S%H757>Archite<s%> came to <S%H7125>meet<s%> him with his <S%H3801>coat<s%> <S%H7167>torn,<s%> and <S%H127>earth<s%> on his <S%H7218>head.<s%>
<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5674>him,<s%> "If you pass on with <S%H4853>me,<s%> then you will be a burden to me;

but if you <S%H7725>return<s%> to the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H53>Absalom,<s%> <S%H5650><s%> 'I will be your servant, O <S%H4428>king.<s%> As I have been your <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H5650>servant<s%> in time <S%H227>past,<s%> so will I now be your <S%H5650>servant;<s%> then will you <S%H6565>defeat<s%> for me the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of <S%H302>Ahithophel.<s%>'

<S%H6659>Don't<s%> you have Zadok and <S%H54>Abiathar<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> there with <S%H1697>you?<s%> Therefore it shall be, that whatever thing you shall <S%H8085>hear<s%> out of the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> you shall <S%H5046>tell<s%> it to <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> and <S%H54>Abiathar<s%> the <S%H3548>priests.<s%>

<S%H8147>Behold,<s%> they have there with them their two <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H290>Ahimaaz,<s%> <S%H6659>Zadok<s%>'s <S%H3083>son,<s%> and Jonathan, <S%H54>Abiathar<s%>'s <S%H3027>son;<s%> and by them you shall <S%H7971>send<s%> to me <S%H1697>everything<s%> that you shall <S%H8085>hear.<s%>"
So <S%H2365>Hushai,<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>'s <S%H7463>friend,<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H5892>city;<s%> and <S%H53>Absalom<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> into <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>
